base_query: Get the semantic mapping named 'Countries_Currencies_Capitals' and join the data and query it to get all countries with their capitals and currencies.
variations: Access the 'Countries_Currencies_Capitals' mapping and compile a query that provides the names of all countries together with their capitals and currencies.
Access the 'Countries_Currencies_Capitals' dataset and create a query that lists every country alongside its capital city and currency.
Use the 'Countries_Currencies_Capitals' mapping to generate a query that outputs every country paired with its currency and capital city.
Please obtain the 'Countries_Currencies_Capitals' dataset and run a query to retrieve a comprehensive list of countries with their respective capitals and currencies.
